entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:09 p.m. CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 16 except 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. High 16 except 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
